steps.title: Draw a small freehand circle in the center of the page for the center of the rose.
steps.content: Draw a small freehand circle in the center of the page for the center of the rose.

steps.title: Add another irregular oval shape at a diagonal base of the above circle for the first petal.
steps.content: Add another irregular oval shape at a diagonal base of the above circle for the first petal.

steps.title: Join a curved line from the small circle to the oval shape for the second petal.
steps.content: Join a curved line from the small circle to the oval shape for the second petal.

steps.title: Complete the first set of petals around the centre by joining yet another curved line to the above.
steps.content: Complete the first set of petals around the centre by joining yet another curved line to the above.

steps.title: Begin drawing the first spiral around the earlier made for the second row of petals.
steps.content: Begin drawing the first spiral around the earlier made for the second row of petals.

steps.title: Engulf the earlier row of petals by a bigger outer irregular curve for the third row of petals.
steps.content: Engulf the earlier row of petals by a bigger outer irregular curve for the third row of petals.

steps.title: Join further outer petals of the rose with wavy lines joining at appropriate places.
steps.content: Join further outer petals of the rose with wavy lines joining at appropriate places.

steps.title: Draw the extreme outer petal of the rose.
steps.content: Draw the extreme outer petal of the rose.

steps.title: Detail the rose further with petals and leaves.
steps.content: Detail the rose further with petals and leaves.

steps.title: Color the rose red with green leaves adding appropriate shades to it.
steps.content: Color the rose red with green leaves adding appropriate shades to it.

steps.title: Draw a small spiral in the centre of the page.
steps.content: Draw a small spiral in the centre of the page.

steps.title: Extend a petal on one side of the spiral.
steps.content: Extend a petal on one side of the spiral.

steps.title: Add another petal to the opposite side of the spiral.
steps.content: Add another petal to the opposite side of the spiral.

steps.title: Draw the third petal at the bottom of the spiral joining the above petal shapes.
steps.content: Draw the third petal at the bottom of the spiral joining the above petal shapes.

steps.title: Add a small detail in the centre of the spiral of the rose.
steps.content: Add a small detail in the centre of the spiral of the rose.

steps.title: Create a leaf each on either side of the flower with a small midrib each.
steps.content: Create a leaf each on either side of the flower with a small midrib each.

steps.title: Color the rose with variations of red and green for the leaves.
steps.content: Color the rose with variations of red and green for the leaves.

steps.title: Draw a vertical curve in the centre of the page for the guide to the stem of the rose .
steps.content: Draw a vertical curve in the centre of the page for the guide to the stem of the rose .

steps.title: Add thorny details on the left side to the above made curved line.
steps.content: Add thorny details on the left side to the above made curved line.

steps.title: Add details also on the right side of the curved line.
steps.content: Add details also on the right side of the curved line.

steps.title: Draw a leaf extending on the top left side of the thorny curve.
steps.content: Draw a leaf extending on the top left side of the thorny curve.

steps.title: Add couple of more leaves on either side of the thorny stem.
steps.content: Add couple of more leaves on either side of the thorny stem.

steps.title: Add details to the leaves by drawing the midrib and a few veins.
steps.content: Add details to the leaves by drawing the midrib and a few veins.

steps.title: Start making the flower from its base by drawing the sepals.
steps.content: Start making the flower from its base by drawing the sepals.

steps.title: Go ahead with drawing the flower petals from the centre and adding one petal to its right.
steps.content: Go ahead with drawing the flower petals from the centre and adding one petal to its right.

steps.title: Add further petals of the rose heading upwards to the centre.
steps.content: Add further petals of the rose heading upwards to the centre.

steps.title: Draw the centre details of the rose petals.
steps.content: Draw the centre details of the rose petals.

steps.title: Detail the leaves with edgy outer blades.
steps.content: Detail the leaves with edgy outer blades.

steps.title: Erase all unnecessary guides and color the rose and the leaves.
steps.content: Erase all unnecessary guides and color the rose and the leaves.

steps.title: Enrich the painting by applying appropriate shades and a shadow.
steps.content: Enrich the painting by applying appropriate shades and a shadow. One challenging thing about drawing can be to draw things as they are, rather than how we think they are. Learning to draw is really about learning to see. Draw something every day and take your time to study how things are.
